HERO.TITLE: Transcripta
HERO.DESCRIPTION: The ultimate tool to ace your next interview with features like speech-to-text and screen search.

ITEM1.TITLE: Enterprise-Grade Voice-to-Text
ITEM1.DESCRIPTION: High-speed, bilingual speech-to-text transcription with sub-2-second turnaround and enterprise-level accuracy.

ITEM2.TITLE: Code-Ready Screen Search
ITEM2.DESCRIPTION: Capture screenshots and instantly extract text or code snippets with ease.

ITEM3.TITLE: Smart Resume Extraction
ITEM3.DESCRIPTION: Auto-import key details from your uploaded resume to contextualize and tailor responses for your needs.

ITEM4.TITLE: One-Click Mode Switching
ITEM4.DESCRIPTION: Seamlessly toggle between behavioral and technical interview modes with the click of a button.

BENEFIT1.TITLE: Unmatched Stealth & Security
BENEFIT1.DESC: Runs invisibly on all major platforms with password-protected access.

BENEFIT2.TITLE: Personalized Performance
BENEFIT2.DESC: Receive resume-tailored responses based on your unique exeperiences and backgrounds.

BENEFIT3.TITLE: Effortless Efficiency
BENEFIT3.DESC: Provides multiple functionality to streamline your prep work and help you ace your task.

BENEFIT4.TITLE: Solution Reasoning
BENEFIT4.DESC: Generates detailed solutions with step by step thought process to help you follow along.

QA.HEADING: Frequently Asked Questions
QA.ANSWER1: We currently offer a trial version. Some core features are permanently free, while advanced features can be unlocked through a subscription.
QA.QUESTION2: Can screen-sharing applications detect Transcripta during use?
QA.ANSWER2: No. Our application blocks all screen capturing requests and will appear invisible. Applications like Tencent Meeting, DingTalk, Zoom, Google Meet, or Microsoft Teams cannot detect nor capture our application.
QA.QUESTION3: How do I log in to the app?
QA.ANSWER3: Access is granted through a SSO password distributed by the team. Ensuring a safe and secure connection every time.
QA.QUESTION4: What modes can I switch between?
QA.ANSWER4: There are currently three modes available: Behavioral, Technical, and Coding. The application automatically adjusts its output logic based on the selected mode.
QA.ANSWER5: We support many popular programming languages, including Python, Java, JavaScript, C/C++, C#, R, SQL, HTML/CSS, MATLAB, Ruby, Go, Swift, TypeScript, Bash/Shell, and VBA.
QA.QUESTION6: Are languages other than English supported?
QA.ANSWER6: Currently, we only support both English and Simplified Chinese. There will be more supported languages in the future.
QA.QUESTION7: What should I do if I experience an issue?
QA.ANSWER7: Please contact the support team through email. We'll respond as quickly as possible to resolve the issue. The support team's contact information can be found in the Contact Us page

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us to Subscribe
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Ready to get started? Contact us via email or scan the QR code to add us on WeChat.
